titlestmt.titleproper: Yale School of Music Graduate Degree Projects
Yale School of Music Graduate Degree Projects
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Jean Elizabeth Roberts

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 00:35

did.unittitle: Graduate degree projects
did.abstract: This collection contains the final written projects of 63 students who were candidates for the Master of Music or Master of Musical Arts degree in the Yale School of Music from 1961 to 1971.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Degree projects are made available for research in the Music Library upon application to a Music Library staff member. Please contact Special Collections staff to schedule an appointment. In some instances, permission to access an individual project may also require permission from the author.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Yale School of Music Graduate Degree Projects are the physical property of the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University. Copyrights belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Misc. Ms. 51, the Yale School of Music Degree Projects in the Irving S. Gilmore Music Library of Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains the final written projects of 63 students who were candidates for the Master of Music or Master of Musical Arts degree in the Yale School of Music from 1961 to 1971. These projects were not collected systematically, so some students who received such degrees during that period may not be represented.
